item.title: Cerence Inc 10-K
item.description: Cerence Inc, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 29, 2022 had 41741 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 444 instances 2022 - 346 instances year - 337 instances fiscal - 324 instances may - 312 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
